item.title: My friend’s father gifted her Tesla and Google stock. They could be worth millions. Will they be split 50/50 in her divorce?
item.description: “My friend is working on an exit plan.”

item.title: As Nasdaq stumbles again, investors start to wonder: Have Big Tech stocks finally peaked?
item.description: The winning streak for mega-cap tech stocks might finally be over.

item.title: I’m 65 and started saving at 23. Do I buy an annuity to protect against diminished Social Security?
item.description: “I will be comfortable spending $250,000 annually on more than $4 million in investments.”

item.title: Worried about taxes on huge RMDs? Consider this alternative to Roth conversions.
